text: March 14, 2018 / 9:24 PM / Updated 9 minutes ago BRIEF-New Senior Investment Group Inc - Says Board Increased Size Of Board To 8 Members Reuters Staff 1 Min Read March 14 (Reuters) - New Senior Investment Group Inc : * NEW SENIOR INVESTMENT GROUP INC - ‚ÄçON MARCH 9, SAYS BOARD INCREASED SIZE OF BOARD TO 8 MEMBERS AND APPOINTED DAVID MILNER AS AN INDEPENDENT DIRECTOR Source text ( bit.ly/2piAgll ) Further company coverage: (Reuters.Brief@thomsonreuters.com)
